pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/License-GPL%20v3-blue.svg :alt: License: GPL v3 :target: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/Django.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/ansicolortags/.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.13.5-blue.svg :alt: Version 1.13.5=============Base REST API=============* Version 1.13.5* `DigitalCube <http://digitalcube.rs/>`_* `WIKI <https://github.com/digital-cube/BASE/wiki>`_************Installation************.. code-block:: console pip3 install dcbase pip3 install -r https://raw.githubusercontent.com/digital-cube/BASE/master/requirements.txt******************Initialize project******************.. code-block:: console basemanager init project_name*************Start project*************.. code-block:: console cd project_name ./project_name*******************Initialize database*******************.. code-block:: console cd project_name basemanager db_init db_username db_password
